name: Graveyard Keeper
description: Build and manage a medieval graveyard while facing ethical dilemmas and making questionable decisions. Welcome to Graveyard Keeper, the most inaccurate medieval cemetery sim of the year.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel core i5, 1.5 GHz and up Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 Gb dedicated video card, shader model 3.0+ DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
